text: Peter Temple-Morris, Baron Temple-Morris (12 February 1938 – 1 May 2018) was a British politician. He was elected as the Conservative Member of Parliament (MP) for Leominster in 1974. He stepped down from the office in 2001 after changing parties. He sat in the House of Lords as a Labour peer. He was born in Cardiff, Wales. Temple-Morris died on 1 May 2018 in London, aged 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Lord Temple-Morris - UK Parliament Category:1938 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Cardiff Category:UK MPs 1974 Category:UK MPs 1997–2001 Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:Labour Life Peers
title: Peter Temple-Morris
